commentary_sequence.speaker: Analyst
commentary_sequence.text: And now Kane with a hit on Ekblad! The Oilers are definitely trying to send a message physically here early on.

commentary_sequence.speaker: Host
commentary_sequence.text: They're not backing down, that's for sure. They want to make Florida uncomfortable.

commentary_sequence.speaker: Analyst
commentary_sequence.text: You can see the game plan. Make it tough on the Panthers' skilled forwards, and hope to capitalize on the power play later.
